subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Zach Thomas appears headed to Texas to play for the Dallas Cowboys in the state where he was a high school and college standout before 12 seasons with the Miami Dolphins. An article on the Cowboys’ Web site said that Thomas, a seven-time Pro Bowl player, met team officials at the scouting combine in Indianapolis and was expected to sign a contract.
